parameter.value: Greetings, |PLAYERNAME|. Welcome to the White Wave Cellar .
Goodbye |PLAYERNAME|, and may the gods be with you.
Sure, have a look at my food. Remember, touching means buying it.
I sell normal and brown bread, meat, ham, cookies, rolls, and cheese made of mushrooms.
I'm Maryza Firehand, daughter of Earth from the Molten Rock.
I'm the cook of the Jolly Axeman.
I sell normal and brown bread, meat, ham, cookies, rolls, and cheese made of mushrooms.
